parameters.name: X-API-TOKEN
parameters.description: The API token to be used for authentication

parameters.name: X-Requested-With
parameters.description: Used to send the XMLHttpRequest header

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Includes child relationships in the response, format is comma separated. Check each model for the list of associated includes

parameters.name: index
parameters.description:
Replaces the default response index from data to a user specific string

ie.

```html
  ?index=new_index
```

response is wrapped

```json
  {
    'new_index' : [
      .....  
    ]
  }
```

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of records to return for each request, default is 20

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to return for this request (when performing pagination), default is 1

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Filter the entity based on their status. ie active / archived / deleted. Format is a comma separated string with any of the following options:  
- active
- archived
- deleted  

```html
GET /api/v1/invoices?status=archived,deleted
Returns only archived and deleted invoices
```

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description:
Filters the entity list by client_id. Suitable when you only want the entities of a specific client.

```html
GET /api/v1/invoices?client_id=AxB7Hjk9
Returns only invoices for the specified client
```

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description:
Filters the entity list by the created at timestamp. Parameter value can be a datetime string or unix timestamp

```html
GET /api/v1/invoices?created_at=2022-01-10
Returns entities created on January 10th, 2022
```

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description:
Filters the entity list by the updated at timestamp. Parameter value can be a datetime string or unix timestamp

```html
GET /api/v1/invoices?updated_at=2022-01-10
Returns entities last updated on January 10th, 2022
```

parameters.name: is_deleted
parameters.description:
Filters the entity list by entities that have been deleted.

```html
GET /api/v1/invoices?is_deleted=true
Returns only soft-deleted entities
```

parameters.name: filter_deleted_clients
parameters.description:
Filters the entity list and only returns entities for clients that have not been deleted

```html
GET /api/v1/invoices?filter_deleted_clients=true
Returns only invoices for active (non-deleted) clients
```

parameters.name: vendor_id
parameters.description:
Filters the entity list by an associated vendor

```html
GET /api/v1/purchases?vendor_id=AxB7Hjk9
Returns only purchases for the specified vendor
```

parameters.name: client_status
parameters.description:
A comma separated list of invoice status strings. Valid options include:  
- all
- paid  
- unpaid  
- overdue

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Search invoices by invoice number

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Searches across a range of columns including:  
- number  
- po_number  
- date  
- amount  
- balance  
- custom_value1  
- custom_value2  
- custom_value3  
- custom_value4
- client.name
- client.contacts.[first_name, last_name, email]
- line_items.[product_key, notes]

parameters.name: without_deleted_clients
parameters.description: Returns the invoice list without the invoices of deleted clients.

parameters.name: overdue
parameters.description: Returns the list of invoices that are overdue

parameters.name: payable
parameters.description: Returns the invoice list that are payable for a defined client. Please note, you must pass the client_id as the value for this query parameter

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Returns the list sorted by column in ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: private_notes
parameters.description: Searches on the private_notes field of the invoices

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Filters the invoices by invoice date returns a list of invoices after (and including) the date

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: Filters the invoices by invoice date returns a list of invoices between two dates

parameters.name: status_id
